Body:
Description: Hello Team customer raise a query for DLP SSL certification installation. 
need you suggestion. 
Following up on our recent discussion, I would appreciate your prompt support in configuring the domain certificate within the DLP platform. This is a critical part of our current security enhancement activities, and timely completion is essential.
Kindly prioritize this request and share your guidance at the earliest convenience.
Thank you for your cooperation.

What We've Learned Updated: 14-05 customer require assistance with the installation of an SSL certification for the DLP platform.
We have informed them that we cannot generate them and guided him on how to import the certificate
Next Steps Updated: 14-05 Waiting for customer to test.

What We've Learned Updated: 14-05 customer require assistance with the installation of an SSL certification for the DLP platform.
We have informed them that we cannot generate them and guided him on how to import the certificate

21-05. In the meeting we have performed the following troubleshooting steps:
tried to access the backend of the server through the EPP VM console
we have restarted the machine and the issue persisted
tried to access the GRUB menu and each time we select to access the console or the boot option the page was returning to the first page
we have shut down the old machine and create a new one
on the new machine we have used the same IP as the previous one
added the ssl certificate and we were able to access the EPP UI with both option (IP and FQDN)Â 
next step was to upload the license
we update the EPP server to the latest version 5.9.4.1
As we agreed this case will be closed since the issue has been fixed.

Next Steps Updated: 14-05 Waiting for customer to test.

21-05 Solved in the remote session.
